description: Providing aircraft wash services for CC130 Hercules and CP140 Aurora aircraft to 14 Wing Greenwood.
full_summary:
===============

**Public Tender Announcement**

**Identification Number**: W0102-22014M

**Brief Description**: The Canadian Government is soliciting offers from contractors to provide aircraft wash services for military aircraft stationed at 14 Wing Greenwood in Nova Scotia, Canada.

**Request for Standing Offer**
---------------------------

This solicitation is a Request for Standing Offer (RFO), which will be open for a period of two (2) years. The successful contractor may be required to provide additional services for up to one (1) additional 12-month period.

**Bid Solicitation Period**
-------------------------

The bid solicitation period will close on [2023-06-05T14:00:00]. Late bids will not be accepted.

**Key Requirements**
----------------

* The contractor must have the necessary security clearances to access the military base.
* The contractor must be able to provide controlled goods services.
* The contractor must be able to provide aircraft wash services for CC130 Hercules and CP140 Aurora aircraft.

**Important Details**
-----------------

* The successful contractor will be required to participate in a debriefing session with the Contracting Authority.
* The debriefing session will be scheduled within 15 working days from the date of notification of unsuccessful bid.
* The solicitation includes specific security requirements that must be met by the contractor.

**Contact Information**
------------------

For more information, please contact:
Furlong, Matthew
Department of Public Works and Government Services
matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Admissibility Criteria**
-----------------------

The bid solicitation will follow a competitive process, where the lowest priced bid will be selected as the winner.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Direct Link to Notice**
-------------------------

You can find more information on this bid solic
